translated: Then, knowing that the Buddha and the rest of the saṅgha of monks were seated comfortably, she served and presented high-quality, delicious food and drink, and so on, up to “knowing that the Blessed One had finished his meal and washed his hands and his bowl, she sat down to one side.”

translated: “We were also the monk Upacel’s fellow practitioners of celibacy. We should have a share of his possessions.”

original: dge slong rnams kyis bsdus te de dag dang lhan cig yang bgos so //
analyzed: dge slong rnams kyis bsdus te de dag dang lhan cig yang bgos so //
translated: The monks gathered them together and divided them up again with the others.

original: yangs pa can pa dang / w'a ra n'a si pa dang / rgyal po'i khab pa dang / tsam pa pa'i dge slong rnams kyis kyang yang dang yang bsdus nas bgos te /
analyzed: yangs pa can pa dang / w'a ra n'a si pa dang / rgyal po'i khab pa dang / tsam pa pa'i dge slong rnams kyis kyang yang dang yang bsdus nas bgos te /
translated: The monks of Vaiśālī, Vārāṇasī, Rājagṛha, and Campā also gathered again and again and distributed the offerings.

original: de ltar grong khyer chen po drug na gnas pa'i dge slong rnams 'dus so //
analyzed: de ltar grong khyer chen po drug na gnas pa'i dge slong rnams 'dus so //

original: dge slong rnams sdud cing 'ged pa na /
analyzed: dge slong rnams sdud cing 'ged pa na /
translated: When the monks were gathering and distributing the offerings,

original: lung nod pa dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / yid la byed pa bor pa'i skabs de /
analyzed: lung nod pa dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / yid la byed pa bor pa'i skabs de /
translated: they neglected to recite the scriptures, read them, chant them, and contemplate them.

original: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The monks asked the Blessed One about this, and the Blessed One said,

original: rnyed pa bgo ba'i rgyu ni /
analyzed: rnyed pa bgo ba'i rgyu ni /
translated: “There are five reasons for distributing offerings:

original: lnga ste / lnga gang zhe na /
analyzed: lnga ste / lnga gang zhe na /
translated: What are the five?

original: gandi dang / rgyud chags gsum dang / mchod rten dang / tshul shing dang / lnga pa ni /
analyzed: gandi dang / rgyud chags gsum dang / mchod rten dang / tshul shing dang / lnga pa ni /
translated: The bell, the three types of continuous offerings, the stūpa, the voting sticks, and the fifth is the request.

original: gsol ba'o // shi ba'i gandi brdungs pa na 'ongs pa @152a *//
analyzed: gsol ba'o // shi ba'i gandi brdungs pa na 'ongs pa @152a *//
translated: When the bell for the deceased is rung,

original: gang yin pa de la rnyed pa sbyin te /
analyzed: gang yin pa de la rnyed pa sbyin te /
translated: the offerings should be given to whoever comes.

original: rgyud chags gsum 'don pa dang / mchod rten la phyag byed pa dang / tshul shing 'brim pa dang / gsol ba byed pa na yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: rgyud chags gsum 'don pa dang / mchod rten la phyag byed pa dang / tshul shing 'brim pa dang / gsol ba byed pa na yang de bzhin no //
translated: The same applies to the recitation of the three scriptures, the circumambulation of the stūpa, the distribution of voting tickets, and the announcement of the motion.

original: dge slong dag /
analyzed: dge slong dag /
translated: “Monks,

original: de lta bas na /
analyzed: de lta bas na /
translated: therefore,

original: shi ba'i yo byad thams cad gsol ba byas te /
analyzed: shi ba'i yo byad thams cad gsol ba byas te /
translated: all the articles of the deceased should be announced and distributed.

original: bgos na mi 'khrugs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bgos na mi 'khrugs par 'gyur ro //
translated: This will prevent disputes.

original: 'di ltar yang bya ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar yang bya ste /
translated: “It should be done like this:

analyzed: gnas mal bshams la zhes bya ba nas dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
translated: The bedding should be arranged, and so on, up to: when the saṅgha has assembled and there is consent,

original: shi ba'i yo byad rgan pa'i mthar bzhag ste /
analyzed: shi ba'i yo byad rgan pa'i mthar bzhag ste /
translated: the articles of the deceased should be placed in front of the most senior monk.

analyzed: dge slong gcig gis rgan pa'i mthar 'dug pa la gsol ba bya'o //

original: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
analyzed: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
translated: ‘Venerable saṅgha, please listen!

original: gnas 'dir dge slong nye dga' gum ste /
analyzed: gnas 'dir dge slong nye dga' gum ste /

original: gum pa de'i yo byad gda' ba dang / mi gda' ba mchis pa 'di lags te /
analyzed: gum pa de'i yo byad gda' ba dang / mi gda' ba mchis pa 'di lags te /
translated: The articles of the deceased that are here and that are not here

original: gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na /
analyzed: gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na /
translated: If the time is right and the saṅgha can accept,

original: dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar /
translated: Thus,

original: dge 'dun gyis dge slong nye dga' gum pa'i yo byad kyi rdzas gda' ba dang / mi gda' ba la gum pa'i yo byad du byin gyis brlab pa'o //
analyzed: dge 'dun gyis dge slong nye dga' gum pa'i yo byad kyi rdzas gda' ba dang / mi gda' ba la gum pa'i yo byad du byin gyis brlab pa'o //
translated: the Saṅgha will consecrate the property of the monk Upasena, both that which is present and that which is not present, as property for the deceased.

original: 'di ni / gsol ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / gsol ba'o //
translated: This is the motion.

original: dge slong dag /
analyzed: dge slong dag /
translated: Monks,

original: 'di ni / shi ba'i yo byad bgos zin pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ni / shi ba'i yo byad bgos zin pa ste /
translated: this is the distribution of the property of the deceased.

original: 'di lta ste /🔽gsol ba'o // gsol ba byas nas dge slong 'ongs pa gang yin pa de la ni /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / gsol ba'o // gsol ba byas nas dge slong 'ongs pa gang yin pa de la ni /
translated: It is as follows:

original: rnyed pa mi sbyin no //
analyzed: rnyed pa mi sbyin no //
translated: After the motion, the property should not be given to the monk who arrived.

original: tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
translated: The venerable Upāli asked the Blessed Buddha,

analyzed: btsun pa / gang na ba dge 'dun mi mthun pas gsol ba bgyid pa ma mchis @152b pa der gum pa'i yo byad bgo bar bgyi'am /

original: bgo bar mi bgyi lags /
analyzed: bgo bar mi bgyi lags /
translated: or should it not be distributed?”

original: nye bar 'khor /
analyzed: nye bar 'khor /
translated: “Upāli,

original: thog ma dang tha ma byas nas bgo bar bya'o //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma byas nas bgo bar bya'o //
translated: it should be distributed after the beginning and end have been performed.”

original: dge slong rnams kyis thog ma dang tha ma ma shes nas /
analyzed: dge slong rnams kyis thog ma dang tha ma ma shes nas /
translated: The monks did not know what the beginning and end were.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: yo byad gcig bsgyur te de las cung zhig /
analyzed: yo byad gcig bsgyur te de las cung zhig /
translated: “One item should be converted and a little bit of that

original: dge 'dun gyi rgan pa dang / dge 'dun gyi gzhon pa la byin nas ci dga' bar bgo bar bya ste /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyi rgan pa dang / dge 'dun gyi gzhon pa la byin nas ci dga' bar bgo bar bya ste /
translated: should be given to the senior monk and the junior monk of the saṅgha. The rest can be distributed as one likes.

original: de la 'gyod par mi bya'o //
analyzed: de la 'gyod par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not regret it.

original: gsol ba'am / thog ma dang tha ma ma byas pa'i shi ba'i yo byad kyi rnyed pa ni /
analyzed: gsol ba'am / thog ma dang tha ma ma byas pa'i shi ba'i yo byad kyi rnyed pa ni /
translated: “The acquisition of the belongings of one who has died without having made a request or having done the beginning and end

original: sangs rgyas kyi slob ma thams cad dbang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi slob ma thams cad dbang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: belongs to all of the Buddha’s disciples.”

original: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas /
analyzed: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas /
translated: The monks had doubts

original: the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
analyzed: the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
translated: and asked the Blessed One, the Buddha, who cuts through all doubts,

analyzed: btsun pa / tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' ma 'os pa'i chags pas gum par gyur pa la gzigs /
translated: “Lord, please explain why the venerable Upasena died because of improper attachment.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: dge slong dag /
analyzed: dge slong dag /
translated: “Monks,

original: da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de /
analyzed: da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de /
translated: this is not the only time this has happened.

original: ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang ma 'os pa'i chags pas shi ba de nyon cig /
analyzed: ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang ma 'os pa'i chags pas shi ba de nyon cig /
translated: Listen to how he died because of improper attachment in the past as well.

original: dge slong dag /
analyzed: dge slong dag /
translated: Monks,

original: sngon byung ba /
analyzed: sngon byung ba /
translated: A past event🔽A hunter shot an elephant in a vital spot with a poisoned arrow.

original: rngon pa zhig gis mda' dug can gyis glang po che'i gnad du bsnun pa dang / de nas de gnad la bab pa'i tshor bas nyen cing mda'i phyi rjes bzhin du song nas rngon pa de srog dang phral lo //
analyzed: rngon pa zhig gis mda' dug can gyis glang po che'i gnad du bsnun pa dang / de nas de gnad la bab pa'i tshor bas nyen cing mda'i phyi rjes bzhin du song nas rngon pa de srog dang phral lo //
translated: Then, as the elephant followed the arrow, it killed the hunter.

original: ji tsam na ma stes te /
analyzed: ji tsam na ma stes te /
translated: Then, by chance,🔽five hundred thieves who had robbed a mountain pass came to that place.

analyzed: chom rkun pa lnga brgya ri bor zhig bcom nas phyogs der phyin pa dang / de rnams kyis glang po che de mthong ngo //

analyzed: mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung bas de rnams kyis smras pa /
translated: Since a famine had occurred, they said,

original: shes ldan dag /
analyzed: shes ldan dag /
translated: “Sirs,

analyzed: sha 'di rnyed kyi /

analyzed: nyis brgya lnga bcus glang po che'i sha @153a *// bcad la btso'o // nyis brgya lnga bcus ni /

original: chu blang ngo //
analyzed: chu blang ngo //
translated: Two hundred and fifty of you fetch water.”

analyzed: de na glang po che'i sha gcod cing 'tshed pa gang yin pa de rnams /

analyzed: 'di snyam du sems te /
translated: thought,

original: shes ldan dag /
analyzed: shes ldan dag /
translated: “Sirs,

original: bdag cag 'di 'dra ba'i las byas pas /
analyzed: bdag cag 'di 'dra ba'i las byas pas /
translated: because we have done this kind of work,

original: rkun rdzas rab tu mang po 'di grub kyi /
analyzed: rkun rdzas rab tu mang po 'di grub kyi /
translated: “We have obtained a great deal of stolen goods.

original: de dag la ci'i phyir sbyin /
analyzed: de dag la ci'i phyir sbyin /
translated: Why should we give it to them?

original: sha las ci yog pa zos la /
analyzed: sha las ci yog pa zos la /
translated: Let’s eat whatever meat we want,

original: lhag ma dug gis gdab po //
analyzed: lhag ma dug gis gdab po //

analyzed: de dag gis sha dug can zos pa dang 'chi bas rkun rdzas bdag gir 'gyur ro //

original: zhes de rnams kyis ci yog pa'i sha zos nas /
analyzed: zhes de rnams kyis ci yog pa'i sha zos nas /

original: lhag ma dug gis btab bo //
analyzed: lhag ma dug gis btab bo //

analyzed: gang dag chu la dong ba de rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du dpyad nas chu ci yog pa 'thungs nas /

original: gang dag sha zos pa de rnams kyis kyang chu 'thungs la /
analyzed: gang dag sha zos pa de rnams kyis kyang chu 'thungs la /

analyzed: gang dag chu 'thungs pa de dag gis kyang sha zos nas thams cad shi bar gyur to //

analyzed: ji tsam na wa zhig dus kyi zhags pas bcings nas phyogs der 'ongs nas /
